reviews.name: Over-the-Door Bath Towel Holder, Pearl Nickel Finish
reviews.reviewText:
PROS:Well built,good for small bathroom with limited space.
CONS:This rack hangs on door top edge, interferring with door jamb so door no longer closes.
reviews.title: Space saver

reviews.name: Over-the-Door Bath Towel Holder, Pearl Nickel Finish
reviews.reviewText: I find the plastic coated over the door bath towel holders are better than stainless steel (nickel), also you would think that it would be easier to remove the towel since the bars roll, the bars are not connected or fastened and them rolling off gets annoying. Another problem that I had which is my fault is that I did not look at the measurement of the hook that goes over the door, my door is not wide enough for the hook so the hook sticks out and the hook itself is thick so the door does not close.
reviews.title: 09 March 2010

reviews.name: Over-the-Door Bath Towel Holder, Pearl Nickel Finish
reviews.reviewText: This actually made me laugh. Unlike some, I read directions first. It said to get a wrench & a phillips screwdriver--so I did. Then I unpacked the unit. This is held together with the tiniest screw and nut I have ever seen--even in a doll unit. They are so small one can hardly hold them in your fingers and there is no wrench or phillips screwdriver made to fit such things. Oh, I got it put together, but I did a lot of laughing. Not too strong & the hooks for over the door are very thick, so if your door isn't very small for the opening, y ou will not be able to shut your door if you use this.
reviews.title: cheaply made

reviews.name: Over-the-Door Bath Towel Holder, Pearl Nickel Finish
reviews.reviewText: I am quite please with this product. When it came, it didn't fit over my door very well, but it was easy enough for my dad to adjust it to fit better. However, if you aren't very handy around the house, this may not be the best option for you. Overall, it looks very nice. For $9, you can't beat it. I have the matching over-the-toilet shelf and they look great...especially for the price.
reviews.title: Overall, quite pleased

reviews.name: Over-the-Door Bath Towel Holder, Pearl Nickel Finish
reviews.reviewText: I returned this item to my local store. After assembling it , i found that it would not fit on my bathroom door. When I returned it, the sales associate told me it was stocked at my local WalMart at a reduced price.
reviews.title: Did not work
